io.github.jonestimd.swing.table.filter

Class PredicateRowFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowFilter<BeanTableModel<T>,java.lang.Integer>
      • io.github.jonestimd.swing.table.filter.PredicateRowFilter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class of the beans in the table

    public class PredicateRowFilter<T>
extends javax.swing.RowFilter<BeanTableModel<T>,java.lang.Integer>
    A predicate based row filter. Uses a text field to provide the filter criteria.
    See Also:
    BeanTableModel
